Our achievements

Empowering Clients with Accessible Private Security.

Selest’s mission is to provide premium security services through our user-friendly mobile application. We are committed to ensuring the security of your private events and offer accessible services. Trust us for fast and dependable private security services for your peace of mind.

We Ready 24 Hours For You

GET OUR EXCLUSIVE SECURITY PLUS MEMBERSHIP

As a privileged member, enjoy remote camera surveillance from our surveillance center 24/7, 365 days a year. This package is ideal for businesses, residential public spaces, as well as unoccupied residences, whether for a short or long period.
